name: Diablo
description: The GOG version of Diablo, with both the classic option and Hellfire expansion working.
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Diablo/dx/DiabloLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Running Setup, please wait...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  overrides:
    ddraw.dll: n
